de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical.extraction

Class HDBSCANHierarchyExtraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical.extraction.HDBSCANHierarchyExtraction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm, ClusteringAlgorithm<Clustering<DendrogramModel>>

    @Reference(authors="R. J. G. B. Campello, D. Moulavi, and J. Sander",
           title="Density-Based Clustering Based on Hierarchical Density Estimates",
           booktitle="Pacific-Asia Conference on Advances in Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining, PAKDD",
           url="http://dx.doi.org/10.1007/978-3-642-37456-2_14")
public class HDBSCANHierarchyExtraction
extends Object
implements ClusteringAlgorithm<Clustering<DendrogramModel>>
    Extraction of simplified cluster hierarchies, as proposed in HDBSCAN. In contrast to the authors top-down approach, we use a bottom-up approach based on the more efficient pointer representation introduced in SLINK. In particular, it can also be used to extract a hierarchy from a hierarchical agglomerative clustering. Reference:

    R. J. G. B. Campello, D. Moulavi, and J. Sander
    Density-Based Clustering Based on Hierarchical Density Estimates
    Pacific-Asia Conference on Advances in Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining, PAKDD

    Note: some of the code is rather complex because we delay the creation of one-element clusters to reduce garbage collection overhead.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
